name: equinix
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing equinix cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`equinix` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-equinix).

authToken.description: The Equinix Metal API auth key for API operations

clientId.description: API Consumer Key available under My Apps section in developer portal

clientSecret.description: API Consumer secret available under My Apps section in developer portal

endpoint.description: The Equinix API base URL to point out desired environment. Defaults to https://api.equinix.com

requestTimeout.description:
The duration of time, in seconds, that the Equinix Platform API Client should wait before canceling an API request.
Defaults to 30

responseMaxPageSize.description: The maximum number of records in a single response for REST queries that produce paginated responses

token.description: API token from the developer sandbox

provider.description:
The provider type for the equinix package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

authToken.description: The Equinix Metal API auth key for API operations

clientId.description: API Consumer Key available under My Apps section in developer portal

clientSecret.description: API Consumer secret available under My Apps section in developer portal

endpoint.description: The Equinix API base URL to point out desired environment. Defaults to https://api.equinix.com

requestTimeout.description:
The duration of time, in seconds, that the Equinix Platform API Client should wait before canceling an API request.
Defaults to 30

responseMaxPageSize.description: The maximum number of records in a single response for REST queries that produce paginated responses

token.description: API token from the developer sandbox
